action.primary: Nourishes the Heart Yin and Blood and calms the Spirit

indications: Heart Yin Deficiency or Heart Blood Deficiency with insomnia and irritability
General weakness, soreness, pain and numbness due to Blood Deficiency
Backache and aching limbs due to Wind-Damp Bi
Itching and skin rashes (topically as a wash)

useCases: Insomnia due to Heart Blood Deficiency, especially for those who have many nightmares.
Generalized muscular weakness, soreness and numbness due to Blood Deficiency.
Externally as a wash for Wind type itching.

Nourishes Heart Blood to Calm the Spirit and invigorates the Blood, reconnects sinews and bones, reduces swelling and expels Wind from the collaterals to restore nourishment to the tissues of the exterior.
Gently and harmoniously relieves constraint, regulates Qi and nourishes the Blood and Yin to calm the Spirit.
Bi Syndrome due to Yin or Blood Deficiency.

notes: It calms mental hyperactivity by strengthening the Heart and consolidating Qi.
It is used as an external wash to treat Wind sores and scabies.
The root of the same plant is Rx. Polygoni Multiflori He Shou Wu which Nourishes Blood.

Both Ye Jiao Teng and Cx. Albizziae #{HeHuanPi} He Huan Pi calm the Spirit. Ye Jiao Teng nourishes the Heart and Liver Blood and expels Wind in the collaterals to stop itch and treat skin disorders. He Huan Pi soothes the Heart and Spleen Qi , invigorates the Blood, stops pain and reconnects sinews and bones.

Ye Jiao Teng, Flos Albizziae #{HeHuanHua} He Huan Hua and Sm. Platycladi #{BaiZiRen} Bai Zi Ren all treat insomnia. Ye Jiao Teng treats insomnia due to Blood Deficiency, He Huan Hua treats insomnia due to Liver Qi Stagnation and Bai Zi Ren treats insomnia due to Heart Deficiency.
